relation: Great for these types of students
Everett is not one of the safest places in Washington...
Great for medical students, accounting students, and many more.
I would rather pay about 10,000* for two years of education than 20,000 for one year at a university.
Shopping, join a club or one of the sports teams, go clubbing.
I heard it was pretty easy as long as you study and do the work.
I heard parking is a drag, so get there early before classes. Online courses also help avoid parking problems. Also register for classes early because they fill up fast!
Getting in is really easy. Lots of opportunity. Extremely inexpensive compared to most colleges.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Sign up for classes the MINUTE you can. They fill up quickly, especially the English & Math classes. Bang for the buck It's worth it. Am enjoying being here The campus is really a good environment. They are somewhat eco-friendly, there are several new buildings, and it is very easy to get in touch with those you need to talk to. Am learning a lot I learn a lot when I'm in class. I don't do well with their online classes.
